Invocation Name: k. k. v. v. the gospel airship
Developer Terms of Use
des: KKVV is a biblically based Christian radio station located in Las Vegas Nevada. We are focused on spreading the truth, straight from the true Word of God! We believe that no soul is too lost for the One true God and we are here to provide that truth to any and all who are willing to listen! We have true followers of the written Word of the Holy Bible that want to spread the good news of the Gospel to those who need to be fed with the meat of the Word! Here at KKVV we want to see the lost repent,
